title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
Cannot access boot menu?
Did you try to boot USB macOS?
Is J9600 installed?

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
It is connected j9600.
The boot menu does not appear and when holding CMD + R it does not appear either. It is only on the INTERROGGATION PASTER.

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message: Disconnect J9600 and try to boot through USB.

message: same thing stays only in the INTERROGATION PASTE.I tested it with another keyboard and apartment. I disconnected the peripherals, but I didn't have a different result.

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message: I managed to climb through CMD+R, but in the disk utility the INTERNAL SSD is not recognizing.

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
PP3V3_2V7_NAND_VCC 0v.
PP1V8_SSD_COLD 0V
STORAGE_LB_EN 0.42V
SSD_RESET_LB_L 0.42V
LPSR_EN_LB_L 1.34V
SSD_PCIE_CLKREQ_LB_L 1.34V
SSD_BOOT_LB_L 0.81V
R9406 2.2ohms

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
Check for short on SSD/NAND voltages.
Touchbar firmware is on SSD.

Still cannot access USB boot?

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
There is no SSD/NAND short in reference to the ground. 

Still cannot access USB boot?'' I cannot enter the boot menu.

I identified that R9350 has 200k instead of 1.3M, replace with an equivalent, but I didn't get a result.

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message: Is it worth continuing ?

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message: I would really like to make this machine work, my boss would be very happy kkk

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
Post actual levels for STORAGE_LB_EN, SSD_RESET_LB_L, PD_L and SSD_PCIE_CLKREQ_LB_L.
Be sure J9600 has good contacts.

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
STORAGE_LB_EN 1.55V
SSD_RESET_LB_L 1.73V

PD_L 0.75V

SSD_PCIE_CLKREQ_LB_L 1.75V

"Be sure J9600 has good contacts" are all good.

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message: Now post STORAGE_EN, SSD_RESET_L, SSD_PWR_EN_L, SSD_CLKREQ_L, 3V3_S5_SSD.

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message: STORAGE_EN 143mV; SSD_RESET_L 3.3V;   SSD_PWR_EN_L  820mV; SSD_CLKREQ_L 3.3V;  3V3_S5_SSD  766mV;

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
"3V3_S5_SSD  766mV"
Do you also miss PP3V3_S5_SSD_LB?
If yes, bad contact on J9600.
Be sure no short at PP3V3_S5_SSD_LB and then you can bypass J9600 with an wire.

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
PP3V3_S5_SSD_LB is also missing. PP3V3_S5_SSD_LB is not short in reference to ground.

"bypass J9600 with an wire" Sorry, I didn't mean what you meant by that.

I pull a wire to the j9600 from the pp3v3 mesh, how do I do that ?

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:
I suppose you get PP3V3_S5; run a wire to PP3V3_S5_SSD_LB.
Try to understand a schematic, please...

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
message:

I am with 11.09V PPVIN_2V7NAND_LB, is this value right ?

title: 820-00239 does not accept commands
